author: epg
msg: r7950 switched this file to using svn_error_wrap_apr to report APR
errors.  Unfortunately, svn_error_wrap_apr itself calls these
functions.  So, when get_xlate_handle and convert_to_stringbug
encounter an APR error, they call svn_error_wrap_apr and enter
(get_xlate_handle): Go back to using svn_error_createf to report APR
(convert_to_stringbuf): Go back to using svn_error_create to report

author: breser
msg: STATUS: Add and vote for r8344

author: breser
msg: Fix perl binding support for dates to work with the new date parser.

author: ghudson
msg: char array for the secret.  Patch from Philip Martin.
